resources.string: The veg menu consists of Paneer Butter Masala, Mushroom Chilli, Veg Manchurian and Malai Kofta. To select press the move button
The non-veg menu consists of Chicken Butter Masala, Mutton Korma, Prawn Chilli and Egg Masala. To select press the move button
Your veg items appear here. If you select non-veg, you cannot opt veg
Your non-veg items appear here. If you select veg, you cannot opt non-veg
